Home.about.title: My name is
Home.about.description: I create all types of programs with a little bit of code, math and magic. I hope to become a computer science engineer soon !
Home.latestPost.title: Latest blog post
About.title: About
About.digital.title: Digital is our future
About.digital.body: I have been evolving since I was a child in a world transcended by digital technology. Smartphones, virtual/augmented reality, artificial intelligence, autonomous vehicles, etc. These advances fascinate me and are the driving force behind my ambition. Today, my wish is to participate in the development of tomorrow's technologies.
About.science.title: Science, ethics and society
About.science.body: I am aware of the ethical and societal issues brought about by advances in the digital field; the debates around aritificial intelligence and robotics are of particular interest to me. I aspire to design innovative and adapted solutions to meet these challenges.
